subject: Rodeos
lead_paragraph: The reigning champion bull rider, Justin McBride, said he plans to retire after the PBR World Finals next month in Las Vegas. McBride, 29, said he has been thinking about retiring since last year but wanted to make sure he would not miss the competition. McBride, from Elk City, Okla., was sidelined for more than six months with surgery on his left shoulder after winning the title last year. He also won in 2005.
